snippet: The revamped menu is 85 percent seafood, up from 75 percent, after eliminating dishes like Spicy Tortilla Soup and Wood-Grilled Pork Chop.
abstract: Red Lobster says it will overhaul its menu to feature more dishes with lobster; revamped menu is 85 percent seafood, up from 75 percent, after eliminating nonseafood items from menu.
lead_paragraph: The revamped menu is 85 percent seafood, up from 75 percent, after eliminating dishes like Spicy Tortilla Soup and Wood-Grilled Pork Chop.

headline.main: Red Lobster Retools Menu to Feature More Seafood
headline.print_headline: Red Lobster Retools Menu to Feature More Seafood
